Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Question for the ledger users here. HyperDEX is now developing a ledger reward claiming app. Do people think 5-10% of claimed interest is a reasonable figure?

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: @Yassin

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: It would send full balance (kmd balance + reward minus fee) back to the KMD address it came from. The GUI will setup the tx and you approve all the info on the ledger as you normally go. This cuts down the pain of 2 ledgers or compromising the ledger to send it back to the same device.

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content: Yeah that‚Äôs pretty fair. What‚Äôs the advantage of a ledger over the agamas encrypted pin?

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content: I‚Äôve got a ledger but never used it and just heard kmd always fkd up or slow to send tx or problems here and there

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content: So never bothered using it LOL

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Basically the key is never exposed to the net

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: By using the app, it gets around ledgers issues and you can claim the reward in the time it takes to send a tx.

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Instead of having to compromise the privkey of the address you want to claim

Author: hyperDEX#6586
Content: Get privkey of address, generate new address on 2nd ledger (or same one), use agama or hyperdex using privkey, claim reward then send to new address - this is the current way
